column4: Okay, when ubuntu get's up to S for names. The S HAS to be SMARMY.  smarmy serpent, smarmy shrew (like that one cause it's a double entendre), smarmy serval, you name it, as long as you don't also describe it, cause I already picked the adjective
Is Mark Shuttleworth here, cause I need to PM him?
yea dude, you just missed him...
